title: This may seem a little biased, but....
body:
I swear on my grave that OCE players are the most toxic group of people in the community. I get that trashing NA players is popular thing to do and makes you "edgy", but at most NA players will flame their junglers,supports, and other players for feeding. OCE players will flame the best player on the team for not carrying them. I've seen enough. I've had OCE friends that sit their and type more than play the actual game. 

Idk if anyone has a similar experience and I get the whole muh #notall. But if we were to single out the toxic NA players form the toxic OCE players. I'm pretty damn sure the salt pillar would located in the OCE region.

replies.body: From personal experience, I've found EUNE players to be the most toxic.

NA toxicity is *nothing* compared to other regions. 

its part because people like to circle jerk NA toxicity. and half because most of them are sensitive to flame.

>I've had OCE friends that sit their and type more than play the actual game.

you need better friends then

> [{quoted}](name=Voldymort,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=kKbOWLr4,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-10-23T06:34:23.236+0000)
>
> you need better friends then

Oh they're long gone. They fucked up my rank experience, so I deleted them.
With this post? It was either you delete them or they leave you behind. You sure ypu're not OCE?

> [{quoted}](name=Xidphel,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=kKbOWLr4,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2018-10-23T11:38:05.543+0000)
>
> With this post? It was either you delete them or they leave you behind. You sure ypu're not OCE?

I'm not OCE

OCE has the same amount of PEOPLE,not players as mostlikely my apartment building, if not less.
even a "small" group of toxic people by our standards, is huge to a small region.

> [{quoted}](name=AR URF,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=kKbOWLr4,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-10-23T06:23:10.390+0000)
>
> OCE players will flame the best player on the team for not carrying them.

What? That sounds egotistical and very subjective. Do you know how many toxic people think they're the best person on the team? 

At the end of the day this is a team game. Using a cheesy champion to prey on a disorganized team isn't "carrying."

I've seen so many Yi or Yasuo players ignore team comps, get fed, then be blown apart late game by teamwork because they think they can do it all by themselves. They don't group and they don't focus on objectives.
